Interface IHashPassword

All Known Subinterfaces:
IAuthChangePassword, IChangePassword
All Known Implementing Classes:
Administrator, AdministratorManager, Doctor, DoctorManager, HMSManager, Patient, PatientManager, Pharmacist, PharmacistManager, Staff, User
public interface IHashPassword
This interface implements hashing for password security

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default String
    hashPassword(String password)
    This method converts the password into hexadecimal string representation
    default boolean
    verifyPassword(String password, String hashedPassword)
    Verifies if a plain-text password matches a stored hashed password.

  • Method Details

    • hashPassword

      default String hashPassword(String password)
      This method converts the password into hexadecimal string representation
      Parameters:
      password - The plain-text password to be hashed
      Returns:
      A hexadecimal string representation of the hashed password
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - If there is an error during the hashing process

    • verifyPassword

      default boolean verifyPassword(String password, String hashedPassword)
      Verifies if a plain-text password matches a stored hashed password.
      Parameters:
      password - The plain-text password to verify
      hashedPassword - The stored hashed password to compare against
      Returns:
      boolean Returns true if the passwords match, false otherwise
